config.CustomCursors.name: Custom Cursors
config.CustomCursors.description: Change the cursors to be lavender-themed.
config.SeasonalPortraitDecor.name: Seasonal Portrait Decor
config.SeasonalPortraitDecor.description: Toggle the seasonal greenery overlay on the potrait window.
config.FriendshipIndicator.name: Friendship Indicator
config.FriendshipIndicator.description: Change the friendship indicator in the portrait window.
config.ArtifactSpotToggle.name: Artifact Spot Toggle
config.ArtifactSpotToggle.description: Change the artifact spots to a small plant.
config.ArtifactSpotColor.name: Artifact Spot Color
config.ArtifactSpotColor.description: Change the color of the artifact spot. You may have to scroll the drop-down to see every option!
